languages.text: {n}Вид камня завораживает Идиру. Она еле слышно шепчет:{/n} "Она прекрасна. Даже в смерти она сияет".
{n}The sight of the gem takes Idira's breath away. You catch her quiet whisper:{/n} "She's beautiful. Even in death, she shines on."
languages.original_text: {n}Вид камня завораживает Идиру. Она еле слышно шепчет:{/n} "Она прекрасна. Даже в смерти она сияет".

{n}The sight of the gem takes Idira's breath away. You catch her quiet whisper:{/n} "She's beautiful. Even in death, she shines on."

languages.text: {n}À la vue de la pierre précieuse, Idira a comme le souffle coupé. Vous l'entendez murmurer :{/n} « Magnifique... Même dans la mort, elle brille de mille feux. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the gem takes Idira's breath away. You catch her quiet whisper:{/n} "She's beautiful. Even in death, she shines on."

traits.locale_text: {n}À la vue de la pierre précieuse, Idira a comme le souffle coupé. Vous l'entendez murmurer :{/n} « Magnifique... Même dans la mort, elle brille de mille feux. »

languages.text: {n}Ver la gema arrebata el aliento a Idira. Puedes oír un leve susurro de sus labios:{/n} «Es preciosa. Incluso en la muerte, sigue brillando».
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the gem takes Idira's breath away. You catch her quiet whisper:{/n} "She's beautiful. Even in death, she shines on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ver la gema arrebata el aliento a Idira. Puedes oír un leve susurro de sus labios:{/n} «Es preciosa. Incluso en la muerte, sigue brillando».

languages.text: {n}看到这颗宝石的那一刻，伊迪拉屏住了呼吸。你听到她轻声低语道：{/n}“她太美了。即便已经死了，她依然熠熠生辉。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the gem takes Idira's breath away. You catch her quiet whisper:{/n} "She's beautiful. Even in death, she shines on."

traits.locale_text: {n}看到这颗宝石的那一刻，伊迪拉屏住了呼吸。你听到她轻声低语道：{/n}“她太美了。即便已经死了，她依然熠熠生辉。”

languages.text: {n}宝石を見たイディラは黙り込んだ。そして、静かに囁いた。{/n}「美しい。死んでいても、なお輝いている」
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the gem takes Idira's breath away. You catch her quiet whisper:{/n} "She's beautiful. Even in death, she shines on."

traits.locale_text: {n}宝石を見たイディラは黙り込んだ。そして、静かに囁いた。{/n}「美しい。死んでいても、なお輝いている」

languages.text: {n}Der Anblick des Edelsteins raubt Idira den Atem. Du hörst sie leise flüstern:{/n} "Sie ist wunderschön. Selbst im Tod strahlt sie noch."
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the gem takes Idira's breath away. You catch her quiet whisper:{/n} "She's beautiful. Even in death, she shines on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Anblick des Edelsteins raubt Idira den Atem. Du hörst sie leise flüstern:{/n} "Sie ist wunderschön. Selbst im Tod strahlt sie noch."

languages.text: {n}Taşın görüntüsü, İdira'nın nefesini kesiyor. Sessizce fısıldadığını duyuyorsun.{/n} "Ne kadar da güzel. Ölümünde bile parlamaya devam ediyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the gem takes Idira's breath away. You catch her quiet whisper:{/n} "She's beautiful. Even in death, she shines on."
